text: Chilodonta is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Chilodontaidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Chilodonta include: * Chilodonta suduirauti Poppe, Tagaro & Dekker, 2006 ==References== * Poppe, G., Tagaro, S. & Dekker, H., 2006. The Seguenziidae, Chilodontidae, Trochidae, Calliostomatidae and Solariellidae of the Philippines Islands. Visaya: 1-128, sér. Supplément 2 Category:Chilodontaidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Chilodonta
